title: Castillo de San Marcos National Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar        Night firing during a special event weekend        There are numerous events at the Castillo throughout the year. Some occur daily or weekly others are annual events or special programs. Explore the schedule of events calendar below to discover what's happening during the time you'll be here.            Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Castillo de San Marcos National Monument Historic Weapons Demonstration      Time: 10:30 AM,        11:30 AM,        1:30 PM,        2:30 PM,        3:30 PM Location: Northeast Gun Deck Fees: Normal fee schedule applies     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 01/30/2015 to 12/19/2020 Reenactors explain and demonstrate the weapons of the Colonial era.
